1100100101110001 1100101100001001 0 -> sum: 1001010001111010, cout: 1
1001001101010100 1000101111100000 0 -> sum: 0001111100110100, cout: 1
1111011111101010 1100001001011000 1 -> sum: 1011101001000011, cout: 1
1000010010000001 0010011000000110 1 -> sum: 1010101010001000, cout: 0
0001000000110101 1101111110101000 0 -> sum: 1110111111011101, cout: 0
0000000000101110 1011111110011011 1 -> sum: 1011111111001010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
0000000000000001 0000000000000010 0 -> sum: 0000000000000011, cout: 0
